languages.text: "В честь столь знаменательного успеха на Даргонусе, как на столичном мире ваших династических владений, идет подготовка Магнэ Ацессио — торжественной церемонии публичного посвящения вас в наследни{mf|ки|цы} почтенной Теодоры фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "В честь столь знаменательного успеха на Даргонусе, как на столичном мире ваших династических владений, идет подготовка Магнаэ Ацессио — торжественной церемонии публичного посвящения вас в наследни{mf|ки|цы} почтенной Теодоры фон Валанциус".

languages.text: "In honour of such a resounding triumph, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's domain, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honourable Theodora von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "В честь столь знаменательного успеха на Даргонусе, как на столичном мире ваших династических владений, идет подготовка Магнэ Ацессио — торжественной церемонии публичного посвящения вас в наследни{mf|ки|цы} почтенной Теодоры фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "In honor of such a resounding success, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's realm, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honorable Theodora von Valancius."

"In honor of such a resounding success, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's realm, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honorable Theodora von Valancius."

"In honour of such a resounding triumph, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's domain, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honourable Theodora von Valancius."

"In honour of such a resounding triumph, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's domain, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honourable Theodora von Valancius."

"In honour of such a resounding triumph, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's domain, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honourable Theodora von Valancius."

languages.text: 「このような偉業を称え、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝領地の首都惑星ダルゴナスでは、栄誉あるシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者にロード・キャプテンを正式に任命する壮大な式典である、マグナ・アクセシオに向けた準備を現在進めています」
languages.original_text: "In honour of such a resounding triumph, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's domain, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honourable Theodora von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: 「このような偉業を称え、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝領地の首都惑星ダルゴナスでは、栄誉あるシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者にロード・キャプテンを正式に任命する壮大な式典である、マグナ・アクセシオに向けた準備を現在進めています」

languages.text: “为了庆祝这一辉煌的胜利，王朝的首都世界达戈努斯此刻正在紧锣密鼓地筹划盛大的继任颂典。在这场隆重的典礼上，您将被正式宣布成为尊敬的西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的继任者。”
languages.original_text: "In honour of such a resounding triumph, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's domain, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honourable Theodora von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: “为了庆祝这一辉煌的胜利，王朝的首都世界达戈努斯此刻正在紧锣密鼓地筹划盛大的继任颂典。在这场隆重的典礼上，您将被正式宣布成为尊敬的西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的继任者。”

languages.text: «En honor de tan sonado triunfo, Dargonus, como mundo capital de su dinastía, está preparando la Magnae Accessio, una gran ceremonia pública en la que se le nombrará oficialmente hereder{mf|o|a} de la honorable Theodora von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "In honour of such a resounding triumph, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's domain, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honourable Theodora von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: «En honor de tan sonado triunfo, Dargonus, como mundo capital de su dinastía, está preparando la Magnae Accessio, una gran ceremonia pública en la que se le nombrará oficialmente hereder{mf|o|a} de la honorable Theodora von Valancius».

languages.text: « En l'honneur de ce triomphe éclatant, Dargonus, monde-capitale du domaine de votre dynastie, est actuellement en pleins préparatifs de la Magnae Accessio, une cérémonie grandiose qui vous présentera au peuple en tant qu'{mf|héritier|héritière} de l'honorable Théodora von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "In honour of such a resounding triumph, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's domain, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honourable Theodora von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: « En l'honneur de ce triomphe éclatant, Dargonus, monde-capitale du domaine de votre dynastie, est actuellement en pleins préparatifs de la Magnae Accessio, une cérémonie grandiose qui vous présentera au du peuple en tant qu'{mf|héritier|héritière} de l'honorable Théodora von Valancius. »

languages.text: "Um diesen enormen Triumph zu ehren, bereitet Dargonus als Hauptwelt des Reichs Eurer Dynastie derzeit die Magnae Accessio vor – eine große Zeremonie anlässlich Eurer öffentlichen Einführung als {mf|Erbe|Erbin} der ehrenhaften Theodora von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "In honour of such a resounding triumph, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's domain, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honourable Theodora von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: "Um diesen enormen Triumph zu ehren, bereitet Dargonus als Hauptwelt des Reichs Eurer Dynastie derzeit die Magnae Accessio vor – eine große Zeremonie anlässlich Eurer öffentlichen Einführung als {mf|Erbe|Erbin} der ehrenhaften Theodora von Valancius."

languages.text: "Biz konuşurken hanedanlığınızın başdünyası Dargonus; büyük zaferinizin onuruna, onurlu Theodora von Valancius'un vârisi olarak halka tanıtılacağınız Magnae Accessio merasimi için hazırlıklar yapıyor."
languages.original_text: "In honour of such a resounding triumph, Dargonus, as the capital world of your dynasty's domain, is currently making preparations for the Magnae Accessio — a grand ceremony of your public induction as the heir of the honourable Theodora von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: "Biz konuşurken hanedanlığınızın başdünyası Dargonus, böyle büyük bir zaferin onuruna, onurlu Theodora von Valancius'un vârisi olarak halka tanıtılmanız amacıyla gerçekleştirilen Magnae Accessio merasimi için hazırlıklar yapıyor."
